com.appfirst.statsd
Class DefaultService

java.lang.Object
  com.appfirst.statsd.DefaultService
All Implemented Interfaces:
StatsdClient, StatsdService
Direct Known Subclasses:
AFService
public class DefaultService
extends Object
implements StatsdService

The Skeleton class of Java Statsd Client with AppFirst Extension.
Note: For best results, and greater availability, you'll probably want to create a wrapper class which creates a static client and proxies to it.
You know... the "Java way."
Based on Statsd Client of (C) 2011 Meetup, Inc. by Andrew Gwozdziewycz , @apgwoz

Author:
Yangming Huang @leonmax, (maintainer) Mike Okner (michael@appfirst.com)

Parameters:

updateStats

public boolean updateStats(int value,
                           double sampleRate,
                           String... buckets)
Description copied from interface: StatsdClient
Send counter metrics with arbitrary magnitude. This one supports sampling.

Specified by:
updateStats in interface StatsdClient
Parameters:
value - - the updating value of the counter.
sampleRate - - Rate of sampling. Note this is a counter only feature.
buckets - - The bucket name of the counter. You can send to more than one counter buckets with the same magnitude.
Returns:
True if success, False if fail to send stats.
